tr.td: 3 out of 6 nodes positive from sample collected by

procedure.text: Left Breast Mastectomy. Notable findings/Comments: none

methodCode.displayName: breast reconstruction with transversus abdominis muscle flap

text.paragraph: Malignant Neoplasm of Nipple and Areola of Female Breast, left breast Diagnosis Date: January 04, 2012

paragraph.caption: Anthracycline Class Total Lifetime Amount Received to Date

text.paragraph: Treatment Intolerance: The patient experienced brief and self-limiting periods of nausea at the start of her chemotherapy sessions. There were no other treatment intolerances observed.

tr.td: Difficulty initiating walking caused by neurotoxicity

Premedicate with Dexamethasone 40 mg PO/IV once daily on days 1-4 and 11-14 every 21 days starting 1 day before administration of Doxorubicin (50 mg/m2) and Cyclophosphamide (500 mg/m2) every 3 weeks. Adminster docetaxel 75 mg/m2 intravenously one hour after completion of Doxorubicin and Cyclophosphamide.
Every 21 days starting 1 day for 6 cycles
Once daily on days 1-4 and 11-14 every 21 days starting 1 day
